title: Major Swag RP Giveaway

embed.description: UPDATE: Club is currently at 29 members! Our website is live at majorswag.shivtr.com for all members and RP give-aways start next week! Put a comment on this thread and add me in-game for your invite to Major Swag :) WHAT IS MAJOR SWAG?

body:
Major Swag has achieved it's goal of 10 signups on our website, and will be announcing it's winner of the $20 RP prize tonight! If you haven't already joined you have unfortunately missed {{champion:98}} your chance at this weeks prize, but don't fear, there are more RP prizes to be won! But you've got to be in it to win it, duh!

To become a part of the club, simply add me in game (it also helps to post your name on the thread I've linked so I can keep track of everyone). You can visit our website and sign up at any time (even before you've been invited to the club), the link for the website is also in the linked post.

The new RP give-away will be announced tomorrow so don't miss your chance to sign up to our club and website to not only be in the running for some free $$$$$$$$, but more importantly, get some major swag. You need it. Believe me. I'm a stranger on the internet and I wouldn't lie to you.
